summary: This program allow you to export model's skin data from NIF to TXT file and than import it to Blender 2.65+
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=yellow][b][u]Description[/u][/b][/color][color=yellow][b][u]:[/u][/b][/color][/size]
This program allow you to export model's skin data from NIF to TXT file and than import it to Blender 2.65+
[u]
[/u][color=yellow][b][u][size=4]Features:[/size][/u][/b][/color]
- helps to modify models with existing skin

[color=#00ffff]Instruction with an example of usage are located inside the archive.[/color]

[color=yellow][b][u][size=4]Issues:[/size][/u][/b][/color]
(none found, ... yet :))

[color=yellow][b][u][size=4]License:[/size][/u][/b][/color]
Don't modify or re-upload this tool without my permission.

[color=yellow][b][u][size=4]Credits:[/size][/u][/b][/color]
NifSkope team for NifSkope
Microsoft for Visual Studio 2010 Express
Bethesda for the Game
author: Anton
